# orderByQuantitySampleStartDate

**Type Property**

An option indicating that the results are grouped by the containing quantity sample’s start date.

## Declaration

```swift
static let orderByQuantitySampleStartDate: HKQuantitySeriesSampleQueryDescriptor.Options
```

## Setting Options

- **includeSample**: An option indicating that the results should include a reference to the quantity sample that contains the series data.

items.description: An option indicating that the results should include a reference to the quantity sample that contains the series data.
items.name: includeSample
